channel.title: Developer on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Developer on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: dotnet: Join Microsoft at NDC London 2026 – Let’s Build the Future of .NET Together
item.description:
Microsoft invites developers to meet the .NET team at NDC London 2026 to explore .NET 10, Azure, and AI-powered development through sessions and 1:1 meetups.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: dotnet: Top .NET Videos & Live Streams of 2025
item.description:
A brief roundup on the .NET Blog highlighting the standout .NET videos, events, and live streams from 2025.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: vscode: Expanding Model Choice in VS Code with Bring Your Own Key
item.description:
The VS Code blog post introduces the new Language Model Chat Provider API and a Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) experience that lets extensions and users choose and integrate different language models for chat functionality, increasing model choice and extensibility in the editor.

  • Source: Visual Studio Code
